tasks.label: Upload main.py
tasks.command: python -m mpremote connect COM10 cp ./main.py :/main.py; python -m mpremote reset

tasks.label: Upload all files
tasks.command: python -m mpremote connect COM10 cp -r . :/; python -m mpremote reset

tasks.label: Erase Flash and reflash firmware
tasks.command: python -m esptool --port COM9 erase_flash; sleep 10; python -m esptool --chip esp32s3 --port COM9 write_flash -z 0x0 'c:\Users\Tim Ehrlich\Downloads\ESP32_GENERIC_S3-20251127-v1.27.0-preview.463.g22cff2f6f5.bin'

tasks.label: Show all files
tasks.command: python -m mpremote connect COM10 fs tree
